summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Mary Avenue Northwest and 13th Avenue Northwest, each from West 75th Street to West 85th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8824 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
